title: Maps from "al-Thawrah al-ʻUrābīyah wa-al-iḥtilāl al-Injilīzī"
creator: Rāfiʻī, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān
description: Maps depicting the 1882 British invasion of Egypt from the 1937 history of the invasion "al-Thawrah al-ʻUrābīyah wa-al-iḥtilāl al-Injilīzī."
subject: Anglo-Egyptian War, 1882; Egypt -- History -- British occupation, 1882-1936; Egypt -- History, Military; Egypt -- History -- Tawfīq, 1879-1892.; ʻUrābī, Aḥmad, 1840 or 1841-1911.
